article_title: Brown medical student Stan Tran seeks GOP nomination for R.I. 1st Congressional District
article_text:
Brown medical student Stan Tran seeks GOP nomination for R.I. 1st Congressional District

PROVIDENCE, R.I. — Combine youthful optimism with the conviction that even the most intractable problems can be solved, then throw in a sterling education that includes medical school, and you begin to...
